name: Camp Rat Fingers- The Dating Sim
name_original: Camp Rat Fingers- The Dating Sim
description:
This is a satirical dating sim that I created for funsies. (Project)

FEATURES:

-Wonderful script

-Beautiful HD graphics

-3 unique mini games

-3 unique routes: true, bad, neutral

-Fabulous glitches

-Harmonious droning of royalty free music and sound effects

-Screen shots in place of the cut-scenes that were originally supposed to be included in the game, but the file size was too large with them included :-I

-Thrills, spills, chills

-A stimulating experience

ENJOY DESU! BOKU NO GAME CHAN PLAY ARIGATO!

*DISCLAIMER*

3rd mini game only available on the true route.

Credit:

Brianna Edmonds: Artist and programmer

Kat: Artist and programmer

Created thanks to ETSU
